courses.course_description: Acceptable as a secondary applied subject on B.S. in music education and B.M. degrees. Materials varies according to educational purpose. May be repeated for credit.
Credit accepted toward all undergraduate music and music education degrees. May be repeated for credit.
Accepted as upperclass credit only in Music Education, music theory, history, or composition.  May be repeated for credit.
courses.prerequisites: 8 hours and 4 semesters of MUS_APMS 2455 or equivalent; audition by committee, and instructor's consent

courses.course_description: Preparation and presentation of Junior Recital. Appropriate applied music course to be taken concurrently. May be repeated for credit. Each recital must be approved by a committee at least two weeks before the recital.
For B.M. degrees in performance.  Study of pedagogy in studio class.  May be repeated for credit.
courses.prerequisites: 8 hours and 4 semesters of MUS_APMS 2455; audition; instructor's consent

courses.course_description: Preparation and presentation of Senior Recital. Appropriate applied music course to be taken concurrently. May be repeated for credit. Each recital must be approved by a committee at least two weeks before the recital.
For music teachers needing instruction in secondary instruments or voice. Maybe repeated for credit.
For graduate credit on M.A., M.Ed., and Ph.D. degrees. Study of pedagogy in studio class. May be repeated for credit.
Required for graduate credit as major applied study on M.M. degree. Acceptable for graduate credit on M.A., M.Ed., Ed.D., and Ph.D. degrees. Maybe repeated for credit.
courses.prerequisites: audition by committee and instructor's consent

courses.course_description: Preparation and presentation of Graduate Recital. Appropriate applied music course to be taken concurrently. May be repeated for credit. Each recital must be approved by a committee at least two weeks before the recital.
